titleStmt.title: His Majesties gracious assent to the petition of the Earles of Lindsey and Cumberland, by the appointment of the Parliament. With His Majesties commission for the confirmation of truce, made between His Majesty and the King of Casteele, the two Kings of East-India, D. Michael de Loronha, Conde de-Linhares, Viceroy of Goa, and William Methwold president of the English in East-India. In all the lands, places, castles, ports, and coasts of Africa, Guyne, Bine, the Island of Saint Thome, &c. and beyond Gape bona Speranza is the dominions of the King of Portugall.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
